name: 닥터 P
description:
Dr. P was developed by expanding into a functional game based on a digital treatment device for panic disorder.

Dr. P is a functional game content for exposure training in environments where panic disorder is most commonly expressed, such as supermarkets, closed spaces with dense crowds, or highways where many threats exist in the surrounding environment.

Dr. P provides two modes.


※Campaign mode
- In campaign mode, characters appear to provide users with game objectives and stories.


- Complete missions by helping characters who are in difficult situations.


- Continue your training through various situations and special events.


- After the mission is over, select your anxiety score.


- Provides step-by-step training to users based on missions played and anxiety scores.

※Custom mode
- Try playing at a level selected by the user and set differently from the campaign mode.

※Result window
- Check what you played through custom mode. You can check what type of play you played.
